entry.title: Ruxcon 11 [Pwnable 2]
entry.summary: This was the second pwnable challenge at Ruxcon 11. Players would SSH into a server running 64 bit Ubuntu and the SSH user’s home directory contained two files: level2 and tokenfile. file and cat quickly revealed that level2 is a x86-64 ELF executable

entry.title: How to setup Middleman
entry.summary:
This post is a reference for myself regarding setting up new machines to post to and existing Middleman blog on github (such as this one). It does not describe how to create your own Middleman blog.

entry.title: Welcome to Ghost
entry.summary:
You’re in! Nice. We’ve put together a little post to introduce you to the Ghost editor and get you started. Go ahead and edit this post to get going and learn how it all works!
